  • Constructor Details

    • InfoPageController

      public InfoPageController()

  • Method Details

    • initialize

      public void initialize()
      This method is to initialize and will be called automatically when the information page is loaded. This method will load the homepage, the information page of this game and set the event listen on the URL text field textFieldURL, search iconsearch_icon, forward icon forwardIcon, backward iconbackwardIcon, and view iconviewIcon.

    • onBackwardClicked

      public void onBackwardClicked()
      set the event handler on the event, MouseClicked for backward icon, backwardIcon. This handler will set the web to the previous one in the history.

    • onForwardClicked

      public void onForwardClicked()
      set the event handler on the event, MouseClicked for forward icon, forwardIcon. This handler will set the web to the forward one in the history.

    • onSearchClicked

      public void onSearchClicked()
      This method is to set the action of the event MouseClicked for the search icon of this web browser. When the search icon is clicked, the web browser will load the URL inputted in the URL text field.

    • onViewIconClicked

      public void onViewIconClicked()
      This method is to set the action of the event MouseClicked for the view icon of this web browser. When the view icon is clicked, the web browser will load the project repository page hosted in University GitLab.
